title: Resident Evil 4 Review Round Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.17.23
description:
Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

We're here to talk video game news!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:35 - Housekeeping
Our Resident Evil 4 review is up right now as a Gamescast! Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Kinda Funny Games Showcase returns next Monday as a 7 hour stream featuring 14 games! Come hang out all day on Twitch and Youtube starting at 10am PT.
For weeks now Andy has carried Mike and Nick through the Lands Between in their seamless co-op Elden Ring play through. Join them today as Andy puts his sanity and possibly his health on the line as they try to play all day long with your help during their Elden Ring mini marathon stream!
The Roper Report   -
00:09:00 - Resident Evil 4 Remake Review Round Up
00:26:16 - Persona 5 is getting a new spin-off game
00:35:56 - Starfield Gets Restricted Rating in Australia
00:38:58 - Three former Blizzard leads have set up new AAA studio
00:42:26 - Zelda: Tears Of The Kingdom Comes With A Fork And Spoon Preorder Bonus In Japan
00:47:35 - Out today
00:51:55 - Squad Up: Restivethought - PS5 - Destiny 2
00:53:00 - You‘re Wrong
Monday’s Hosts: NO GAMES DAILY! All Day GDC Stream! 

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
